description:
Yuda, of the Star of Deception and its crimson gleam, deemed himself the most beautiful in the world.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nanto Koukakuken Yuda! Sono Utsukushiki Hohoemi ga Higeki o Yobu!!
Yuda of the South Star Crimson Crane Fist! His Beautiful Smile Calls for Tragedy!!
南斗紅鶴拳ユダ! その美しき微笑が悲劇を呼ぶ!!
